item.title: How to Install Squirrel on Macos
item.author: echo.wings@gmail.com (echowings)
item.description: How to install squirrel as your chinese input method for your macos 1. Install squirrel 1 brew cask install squirrel 2. Logout and login or Reboot your mac Reboot your mac 3. Copy squirrel configuration for you configuration file: https://github.com/wongdean/rime-settings# 1 2 mkdir rime && cd rime git clone https://github.com/wongdean/rime-settings.git 4. configure squrriel Press control + space key to enable squirrel. Then click settings.
